languages.text: "Меня особо не спрашивали, Ваше Светлишество. Схватили, засунули в платье и выпустили. Нас ведь тут никого не спрашивают. Но я не хочу быть игрушкой. У меня трое отроков да дочурка, не покладая рук с ними крахмалим исподнее господ, лишь бы объедков на день хватило!" {n}Женщина демонстрирует мозолистые взбухшие пальцы с пунцовыми следами химических ожогов.{/n}

"It's not like they asked me nicely, Your Graciousness. They grabbed me, shoved me in this dress, and threw me in here. Nobody here was asked. But I don't want to be anybody's toy. I have three boys and a girl, we starch our lords and ladies' undergarments, and we work our fingers to the bone just to get enough scraps for the day!" {n}She shows you her calloused hands, mottled red from chemical burns.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Меня особо не спрашивали, Ваше Светлишество. Схватили, засунули в платье и выпустили. Нас ведь тут никого не спрашивают. Но я не хочу быть игрушкой. У меня трое отроков да дочурка, не покладая рук с ними крахмалим исподнее господ, лишь бы объедков на день хватило!" {n}Женщина демонстрирует мозолистые взбухшие пальцы с пунцовыми следами химических ожогов.{/n}

I have three boys and a girl, we starch our lords and ladies' undergarments, and we work our fingers to the bone just to get enough scraps for the day!" {n}She shows you her calloused hands and the red marks from chemical burns.{/n}

I have three boys and a girl, we starch our lords and ladies' undergarments, and we work our fingers to the bone just to get enough scraps for the day!" {n}She shows you her calloused hands, mottled red from chemical burns.{/n}

languages.text: “因为我根本没得选，大人。那些人抓住了我，强行把我塞进这身裙子，丢在这里。这里所有人都没得选，但我不想成为任何人的玩物，大人。我还有三个儿子和一个女儿要养，我们天天给那些老爷、小姐们洗衣服，拼命干活，就是为了能让一家人勉强吃得上饭。”{n}她向你伸出了长满老茧的双手，上面带着斑驳的红点，都是被化学药剂灼伤的痕迹。{/n}
languages.original_text: "It's not like they asked me nicely, Your Graciousness. They grabbed me, shoved me in this dress, and threw me in here. Nobody here was asked. But I don't want to be anybody's toy. I have three boys and a girl, we starch our lords and ladies' undergarments, and we work our fingers to the bone just to get enough scraps for the day!" {n}She shows you her calloused hands, mottled red from chemical burns.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “因为我根本没得选，大人。那些人抓住了我，强行把我塞进这身裙子，丢在这里。这里所有人都没得选，但我不想成为任何人的玩物，大人。我还有三个儿子和一个女儿要养，我们天天给那些老爷、小姐们洗衣服，拼命干活，就是为了能让一家人勉强吃得上饭。”{n}她向你伸出了长满老茧的双手，上面带着斑驳的红点，都是被化学药剂灼伤的痕迹。{/n}

languages.text: 「丁寧に頼まれたわけじゃないよ。ありがたき方。連中は私を捕まえて、このドレスを無理やり着せて、ここに放り込んだんだ。ここにいる誰もが、自分の意思で来たわけじゃない。でも、私は誰かの玩具になんてなりたくないんだ。うちには息子が三人と娘が一人いて、私たちは貴族さまたちの下着にまで糊を当てて、指がすり減るほど働いて、ようやくその日の食べ物をかき集めてるんだよ！」{n}彼女は、薬品でただれ、赤くまだらになったタコだらけの手を見せた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "It's not like they asked me nicely, Your Graciousness. They grabbed me, shoved me in this dress, and threw me in here. Nobody here was asked. But I don't want to be anybody's toy. I have three boys and a girl, we starch our lords and ladies' undergarments, and we work our fingers to the bone just to get enough scraps for the day!" {n}She shows you her calloused hands, mottled red from chemical burns.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「丁寧に頼まれたわけじゃないよ。ありがたき方。連中は私を捕まえて、このドレスを無理やり着せて、ここに放り込んだんだ。ここにいる誰もが、自分の意思で来たわけじゃない。でも、私は誰かの玩具になんてなりたくないんだ。うちには息子が三人と娘が一人いて、私たちは貴族さまたちの下着にまで糊を当てて、指がすり減るほど働いて、ようやくその日の食べ物をかき集めてるんだよ！」{n}彼女は、薬品でただれ、赤くまだらになったタコだらけの手を見せた。{/n}

languages.text: «Tampoco es que me lo pidieran de buenas maneras, Excelencia. Me agarraron, me embutieron en este vestido y me arrojaron aquí dentro. Como a todos los presentes. Pero yo no pienso ser el juguete de nadie. ¡Tengo tres hijos y una hija, almidonamos las prendas íntimas de nuestros señores y damas, y nos dejamos la piel trabajando para llevarnos algo a la boca!». {n}La mujer te muestra sus manos encallecidas, manchadas de rojo por numerosas quemaduras químicas.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It's not like they asked me nicely, Your Graciousness. They grabbed me, shoved me in this dress, and threw me in here. Nobody here was asked. But I don't want to be anybody's toy. I have three boys and a girl, we starch our lords and ladies' undergarments, and we work our fingers to the bone just to get enough scraps for the day!" {n}She shows you her calloused hands, mottled red from chemical burns.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Tampoco es que me lo pidieran de buenas maneras, Excelencia. Me agarraron, me embutieron en este vestido y me arrojaron aquí dentro. Como a todos los presentes. Pero yo no pienso ser el juguete de nadie. ¡Tengo tres hijos y una hija, almidonamos las prendas íntimas de nuestros señores y damas, y nos dejamos la piel trabajando para llevarnos algo a la boca!». {n}La mujer te muestra sus manos encallecidas, manchadas de rojo por numerosas quemaduras químicas.{/n}

languages.text: "Güzellikle rica etmediler ki {mf|beyim|hanımım}. Çektiler beni kenara, bu elbiseyi de üzerime geçirdiler, buraya salıverdiler! Kimsenin bir şey istediği yok. Bende de kimsenin kuklası olacak göz yok ama. Üç oğlum, bir kızım var. Lordların, leydilerin donlarını kolalarız. Yatağa aç girmeyelim diye dişimizi tırnağımıza takıyoruz!" {n}Kimyasal yanıklarla kaplı, nasır tutmuş ellerini gösteriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It's not like they asked me nicely, Your Graciousness. They grabbed me, shoved me in this dress, and threw me in here. Nobody here was asked. But I don't want to be anybody's toy. I have three boys and a girl, we starch our lords and ladies' undergarments, and we work our fingers to the bone just to get enough scraps for the day!" {n}She shows you her calloused hands, mottled red from chemical burns.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Güzellikle rica etmediler ki {mf|beyim|hanımım}. Çektiler beni kenara, bu elbiseyi de üzerime geçirdiler, buraya salıverdiler! Kimsenin bir şey istediği yok. Bende de kimsenin kuklası olacak göz yok ama. Üç oğlum, bir kızım var. Lordların, leydilerin donlarını kolalarız. Yatağa aç girmeyelim diye dişimizi tırnağımıza takıyoruz!" {n}Kimyasal yanıklarla kaplı, nasır tutmuş ellerini gösteriyor.{/n}

languages.text: « Ce n'est pas comme s'ils m'avaient demandé poliment mon avis, Votre Gracieuseté. Ils m'ont attrapée et m'ont fourré dans cette robe avant de me jeter ici. Aucun de nous n'a eu le choix. Mais je ne veux être le jouet de personne. J'ai trois fils et une fille avec qui j'amidonne les sous-vêtements de la haute société, et on use nos doigts jusqu'à l'os juste pour gagner de quoi survivre chaque jour ! » {n} dit-elle en vous montrant ses mains calleuses marbrées de rouge par des brûlures chimiques.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It's not like they asked me nicely, Your Graciousness. They grabbed me, shoved me in this dress, and threw me in here. Nobody here was asked. But I don't want to be anybody's toy. I have three boys and a girl, we starch our lords and ladies' undergarments, and we work our fingers to the bone just to get enough scraps for the day!" {n}She shows you her calloused hands, mottled red from chemical burns.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Ce n'est pas comme s'ils m'avaient demandé poliment mon avis, Votre Gracieuseté. Ils m'ont attrapée et m'ont fourré dans cette robe avant de me jeter ici. Aucun de nous n'a eu le choix. Mais je ne veux être le jouet de personne. J'ai trois fils et une fille avec qui j'amidonne les sous-vêtements de la haute société, et on use nos doigts jusqu'à l'os juste pour gagner de quoi survivre chaque jour ! » {n} dit-elle en vous montrant ses mains calleuses marbrées de rouge par des brûlures chimiques.{/n}

languages.text: "Sie haben mich jedenfalls nicht freundlich darum gebeten, Euer Gnaden. Sie haben mich gepackt, in dieses Kleid gesteckt und hier reingeworfen. Niemand hier wurde gefragt. Aber ich will niemandes Spielzeug sein. Ich habe drei Jungen und ein Mädchen, wir stärken die Unterkleidung unserer Herren und Herrinnen, und wir arbeiten uns die Finger wund, nur um genügend Essensreste für den Tag zu erhalten!" {n}Sie zeigt dir ihre geschundenen Hände, stark gerötet durch chemische Verbrennungen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It's not like they asked me nicely, Your Graciousness. They grabbed me, shoved me in this dress, and threw me in here. Nobody here was asked. But I don't want to be anybody's toy. I have three boys and a girl, we starch our lords and ladies' undergarments, and we work our fingers to the bone just to get enough scraps for the day!" {n}She shows you her calloused hands, mottled red from chemical burns.{/n}

Ich habe drei Jungen und ein Mädchen, wir stärken die Unterkleidung unserer Herren und Herrinnen, und wir arbeiten uns die Finger wund, nur um genügend Essensreste für den Tag zu erhalten!" {n}Sie zeigt dir ihre geschundenen Hände, stark gerötet durch chemische Verbrennungen.{/n}
